price: Lalle ne Allah Yanã shigar da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni* kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai a cikin gidãjen Aljanna, ƙoramu na gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu. Lalle ne Allah Yanã aikata abin da Yake nufi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفۡعَلُ مَا يُرِيدُ
footnotes: * Kashi na huɗu sũ ne mũminai waɗanda suke tsõron Allah, su tsaya a inda Yatsayar da su. Su ne mafi ƙarancin kashi ga uku na farko.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru inna al-laha yafʿalu mā yurīdu
